mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATINGBOARD (SEQ, CHATMYID, CHATYOURID, CHATGROUPID, CHATCONTENT, CHATREGDATE,REPORT_STATUS) VALUES(CHATINGBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{chatmyid}, #{chatyourid},#{chatgroupid},NULL,SYSDATE,'N')
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ,CHATGROUPID,CHATYOURID,CHATMYID FROM (SELECT SEQ,CHATGROUPID,CHATMYID,CHATYOURID,ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY CHATREGDATE DESC) RN FROM CHATINGBOARD c WHERE REPORT_STATUS ='N' AND CHATMYID = #{chatmyid}) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 10
mapper.update: UPDATE CHATINGBOARD SET REPORT_STATUS ='Y' WHERE CHATGROUPID = #{chatgroupid}
